languages.text: "Пост охраны, выставленный нами в тех штреках, доложил о боестолкновении, а затем пропал со связи".
"The security post that we set up in those mining drifts reported a skirmish and then went silent."
languages.original_text: "Пост охраны, выставленный нами в тех штреках, доложил о боестолкновении, а затем пропал со связи".

traits.locale_text: "The security post that we have set up in those drifts reported a skirmish and then went silent."
"The security post that we have set up in those drifts reported a skirmish and then went silent."
"The security post that we set up in those mining drifts reported a skirmish and then went silent."
"The security post that we set up in those mining drifts reported a skirmish and then went silent."
"The security post that we set up in those mining drifts reported a skirmish and then went silent."
"The security post that we set up in those mining drifts reported a skirmish and then went silent."

languages.text: “我们在矿区设立的哨所报告发生了小规模冲突，随后就失去了联系。”
languages.original_text: "The security post that we set up in those mining drifts reported a skirmish and then went silent."

traits.locale_text: “我们在矿区设立的哨所报告发生了小规模冲突，随后就失去了联系。”

languages.text: «El puesto de seguridad que establecimos en esas galerías mineras informó de una escaramuza y luego enmudeció».
languages.original_text: "The security post that we set up in those mining drifts reported a skirmish and then went silent."

traits.locale_text: «El puesto de seguridad que establecimos en esas galerías mineras informó de una escaramuza y luego enmudeció».

languages.text: 「鉱山の通路に配置した警備隊は、小競り合いを報告した後、沈黙しました」
languages.original_text: "The security post that we set up in those mining drifts reported a skirmish and then went silent."

traits.locale_text: 「鉱山の通路に配置した警備隊は、小競り合いを報告した後、沈黙しました」

languages.text: « Le poste de sécurité que nous avons installé dans ces galeries a signalé une attaque et, depuis, il ne répond plus. »
languages.original_text: "The security post that we set up in those mining drifts reported a skirmish and then went silent."

traits.locale_text: « Le poste de sécurité que nous avons installé dans ces galeries a signalé une attaque et, depuis, il ne répond plus. »

languages.text: "Unser Sicherheitsposten in diesen Minenschächten hat ein Scharmützel gemeldet, dann ist der Kontakt abgebrochen."
languages.original_text: "The security post that we set up in those mining drifts reported a skirmish and then went silent."

traits.locale_text: "Unser Sicherheitsposten in diesen Minenschächten hat ein Scharmützel gemeldet, dann ist der Kontakt abgebrochen."

languages.text: "Madenlere kurduğumuz karakol, bir çatışma bildirdikten sonra sessizliğe gömüldü."
languages.original_text: "The security post that we set up in those mining drifts reported a skirmish and then went silent."
